entry.title: Shiba Inu Devs Roll Out Major Speed Improvement For Shibarium
entry.summary:
The development team behind Shiba Inu (SHIB) has implemented a major upgrade to the Shibarium network, slashing the bridging time for tokens to Ethereum from a lengthy seven days to just approximately 45 minutes. This significant reduction in transfer time represents a pivotal shift towards optimizing operational efficiency and enhancing user experience.
Shiba Inu‚Äôs Shibarium Makes Major Leap
The update was first announced via an official post on the Shibarium network‚Äôs X account, which stated, ‚ÄúGet ready for a much faster and smoother experience #SHIBARMY. We‚Äôve cut down the bridge time from #Shibarium to Ethereum from 7 days to approximately 45 minutes!‚Äù
This post highlighted a strategic pivot away from the original intent of the seven-day delay, which was designed to stabilize tok‚Ä¶

entry.title: SEC Slapped With $1.8 Million Bill After Debt Box Case Dismissal
entry.summary:
The recent legal showdown between the US Securities and Exchange Commission and Digital Licensing Inc., operating as Debt Box, has taken a surprising turn in favor of the latter. Chief Judge Robert J. Shelby of the US District Court for the District of Utah junked the SEC‚Äôs civil suit against Debt Box on May 28, 2024, marking a significant victory for the company.
SEC‚Äôs Regulatory Overreach Vs. Debt Box
The initial lawsuit by the SEC, filed on July 26, 2023, accused Debt Box of orchestrating an illegal $50 million cryptocurrency scheme. However, the tables turned when Debt Box submitted documents exposing the SEC‚Äôs falsehoods and misrepresentations, leading to the case‚Äôs dismissal. This incident has been viewed by the cryptocurrency community as a clear example of regulatory overreac‚Ä¶

entry.title: Robinhood Unveils Crypto Trading API to Enhance Market Accessibility
entry.summary: Robinhood has introduced its Crypto Trading API to enable users to craft their trading programs and use algorithms to swiftly execute trades. This offering aims to streamline trading processes and allow users to diversify their strategies, catering to both seasoned traders and novices exploring the market. Round-the-Clock Accessibility Robinhood's API enables users to engage in round-the-clock trading programmatically to ensure flexibility and responsiveness to market movements regardless of the time zone. Unlike traditional stock markets, the crypto market operates 24/7, presenting unique challenges and opportunities. According to Robinhood, the introduction of the Crypto Trading API fosters a collaborative environment where users can share their code and trading strateg‚Ä¶

entry.title: Renowned Economist Peter Schiff Mocks Bitcoin Believers In Scathing New Posts
entry.summary:
Renowned Chief economist and Bitcoin skeptic, Peter Schiff is making headlines again with his latest controversial statement mocking BTC. In an X (formerly Twitter) post laden with sarcasm, Schiff suggested a radical scenario where everyone becomes rich after companies in the United States sell off their entire assets to invest in BTC.¬†
Schiff Says Sell Everything, Buy Bitcoin
In his scathing X post, Schiff described a hypothetical scenario where all the publicly traded companies in the US completely shut down their operations, fire all their employees and sell off 100% of their assets. He went further to suggest that these companies use all the proceeds from the sale to buy Bitcoin.¬†
According to Schiff, if such a scenario occurred, the value of Bitcoin could be worth millions of ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Goldman Sachs: Bitcoin ETFs Are an 'Astonishing Success'
entry.summary:
Goldman Sachs is striking an increasingly positive tone on Bitcoin calling the new spot Bitcoin ETFs an "astonishing success" after years of scepticism.
JUST IN: üá∫üá∏ Goldman Sachs says the #Bitcoin ETF approval was a "big psychological turning point." It has been an ‚Äúastonishing success.‚Äù üöÄ pic.twitter.com/fcuhXMyAah ‚Äî Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) May 30, 2024
At the Consensus 2024 conference hosted by CoinDesk, Goldman's global head of digital assets, Mathew McDermott, said the SEC's approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs earlier this year marked a "big psychological turning point" for the industry. "The Bitcoin ETF obviously has been an astonishing success," McDermott said, signalling a change in Goldman's stance after dismissing the idea of Bitcoin ETFs earlier.¬† The bank has sin‚Ä¶

As Bitcoin continues to gain widespread adoption, billionaire and Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood in an intriguing projection has predicted that El Salvador‚Äôs Gross Domestic Profit (GDP) could increase tenfold in the next five years, which has since captured the attention of the global financial community.¬†

El Salvador‚Äôs Bitcoin And AI Adoption To Boost Country‚Äôs Economy

Swiss to adopt global crypto tax rules. FTX repayments create ‚Äòbullish overhang‚Äô for crypto. SEI up 30% after proposing v2 upgrade.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 117 - BITCOIN GAINS ON CPI
entry.summary: BTC bounces driven by spot buying. US ETF sees $100M+ inflow for first time in weeks. State of Wisconsin buys $170M of BTC ETF. Vanguard appoints Bitcoin friendly CEO. Coinbase sees billions of BTC leave exchange. BTC to consolidate between $55-75K: Novogratz. SOL beats ETH TEV for first time ever. ETH may be labelled a security by SEC next week. AI & memes the only two positive sectors this week. Crypto hostility led by TradFi: Lubin. Tornado Cash developer guilty of money laundering. Circle shifts legal hope to US ahead of IPO. Cypher developer gambled $300K of customer funds.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 116 - ROARING KITTY RETURNS!
entry.summary: Crypto falls, stays in range ahead of CPI tomorrow. US ETFs see small net inflow led by Fidelity HK ETFs wipe 2 weeks of inflows in a single day. Bracebridge bought $363m of BTC ETFs. Coinbase has system wide outage. Poloniex hacker sends funds to Tornado Cash. Brazil biggest in LATAM for crypto trading. Biden removes China BTC miner near military base. CertiK patches $5m flaw in Aptos bridge. LayerZero sees 100k bot accounts self-report. DYDX CEO set to leave. Tate sells $500k BTC to buy GME.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Roger Dickerman
entry.summary: In this week‚Äôs episode, we sit down with our good friend and founder of the 24 Hours of Art, Roger Dickerman. We dive into Roger‚Äôs background in trading and fitness, his love of art, founding Artifex and 24 Hours of Art, the power of routines, and so much more.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Funghi
entry.summary:
In this week‚Äôs episode, we sit down with our good friend and co-founder of Shillr, Funghibull. Funghi is one of our favorite collectors, builders and overall people in the space.
We dive into Funghi‚Äôs background playing rugby, going to medical school in Scotland, 10 gram mushroom trips, finding punks, forming Shillr, and so much more.

entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer Mika explains the recent Bitcoin halving and how you can build your understanding through Kraken's Learn Center.

entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator Orangie plays the new season of multiplayer builder-game My Neighbor Alice and tries out all its features.

entry.title: Solana Leads The Bounce
entry.summary: Crypto up despite ETF outflow, SOL outperforms. HK ETFs also see another net daily outflow. SOL flips ETH again in 24hr DEX volume. SOL revenue now 50% of ETH. Bitcoin above $1m by 2030: Dorsey. Bitcoin & Kucoin get license in India. Kraken tries to get SEC case dismissed. Stand with Crypto sets up election war chest. VIP customers make up two thirds of Binance volume. NOT to launch on Binance & OKX. TON up 20%, speculation it will be listed after NOT. Securitize & BlackRock look to launch on ARB. Franklin Templeton calls for ‚ÄòBase season‚Äô. EIGEN claims go live today, will be un-transferable. Eclipse founder leaves after harassment claims.

entry.title: Inside Manhattan‚Äôs Newest On-Chain Fashion Store: 9dcc
entry.summary: At NFT NYC, Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz explored the on-chain fashion brand‚Äôs latest pop-up, and spoke to its founder Gmoney about 9dcc‚Äôs future expansion plans.
